data.lyric:
[ti:Waiting On A Miracle (From "Encanto"/Soundtrack Version)]
[ar:Stephanie Beatriz]
[al:Encanto (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Waiting On A Miracle (From "Encanto"/Soundtrack Version) - Stephanie Beatriz
[00:03.31]Lyrics by：Lin-Manuel Miranda
[00:06.62]Composed by：Lin-Manuel Miranda
[00:09.94]Don't be upset or mad at all
[00:12.46]
[00:15.58]Don't feel regret or sad at all
[00:18.21]
[00:20.20]Hey I'm still a part of the family Madrigal
[00:24.01]And I'm fine I am totally fine
[00:27.36]
[00:27.91]I will stand on the side as you shine
[00:31.63]
[00:33.32]I'm not fine I'm not fine
[00:37.93]I can't move the mountains
[00:40.81]
[00:41.54]I can't make the flowers bloom
[00:45.53]I can't take another night
[00:48.33]Up in my room
[00:50.15]Waiting on a miracle
[00:52.91]I can't heal what's broken
[00:55.84]
[00:56.70]Can't control the morning rain or a hurricane
[01:00.44]Can't keep down the unspoken invisible pain
[01:05.01]Always waiting on a miracle a miracle
[01:07.95]
[01:08.48]Always walking alone
[01:11.07]
[01:12.22]Always wanting for more
[01:15.07]
[01:15.98]Like I'm still at that door
[01:18.63]Longing to shine like all of you shine
[01:23.66]All I need is a change
[01:26.28]
[01:27.42]All I need is a chance
[01:30.27]
[01:31.20]All I know is I can't
[01:33.85]Stay on the side
[01:35.84]Open your eyes
[01:37.57]Open your eyes
[01:39.53]Open your eyes
[01:42.27]I would move the mountains
[01:45.34]
[01:45.97]Make new trees and flowers grow
[01:49.81]Someone please just let me know
[01:52.70]Where do I go
[01:54.29]I am waiting on a miracle
[01:56.40]A miracle
[01:57.04]
[01:57.59]I would heal what's broken
[02:00.43]
[02:01.11]Show this family something new
[02:04.94]Who I am inside
[02:07.24]So what can I do
[02:09.31]I'm sick of waiting on a miracle
[02:11.57]So here I go
[02:12.34]
[02:13.01]I am ready
[02:14.48]Come on I'm ready
[02:16.01]
[02:16.67]I've been patient and steadfast and steady
[02:19.78]
[02:20.53]Bless me now as you blessed us all those years ago
[02:24.70]When you gave us a miracle
[02:28.29]
[02:30.79]Am I too late for a miracle
data.trans:
[ti:Waiting On A Miracle (From "Encanto"/Soundtrack Version)]
[ar:Stephanie Beatriz]
[al:Encanto (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.31]//
[00:06.62]//
[00:09.94]不要感到不安或是感到愤怒
[00:12.46]
[00:15.58]不要感到懊悔或是感到伤心
[00:18.21]
[00:20.20]我仍是Madrigal家族的一员
[00:24.01]我感觉良好 我感觉良好
[00:27.36]
[00:27.91]当你绽放光芒 我会站到一旁
[00:31.63]
[00:33.32]我感觉失落 我感觉不安
[00:37.93]我无法移山
[00:40.81]
[00:41.54]我无法让花儿怒放
[00:45.53]无法忍受在我房间
[00:48.33]彻夜不眠
[00:50.15]等待奇迹降临
[00:52.91]我无法修补破碎的东西
[00:55.84]
[00:56.70]无法控制晨间的雨或是飓风
[01:00.44]无法压抑无形的痛
[01:05.01]总是等待奇迹降临
[01:07.95]
[01:08.48]总是孤身一人前往
[01:11.07]
[01:12.22]总是渴望更多
[01:15.07]
[01:15.98]我仍在门前等候着
[01:18.63]渴望能像你们那样绽放光芒
[01:23.66]我只需要做出改变
[01:26.28]
[01:27.42]我只需要一个机遇
[01:30.27]
[01:31.20]我只知道我不能够
[01:33.85]站在一旁
[01:35.84]睁开你的双眸
[01:37.57]睁开你的双眸
[01:39.53]睁开你的双眸
[01:42.27]我能移山
[01:45.34]
[01:45.97]让树木花草焕发生机
[01:49.81]能否有人告诉我
[01:52.70]我该前往何处
[01:54.29]我在等待奇迹降临
[01:56.40]一个奇迹
[01:57.04]
[01:57.59]我会修补破碎的东西
[02:00.43]
[02:01.11]让我的家庭对我刮目相看
[02:04.94]展示我的真实内心
[02:07.24]所以我能做些什么
[02:09.31]我厌倦了等待奇迹降临
[02:11.57]所以我已行动
[02:12.34]
[02:13.01]我已做好准备
[02:14.48]来吧 我已做好准备
[02:16.01]
[02:16.67]我一直耐心等待着 坚定信念 逐渐前进
[02:19.78]
[02:20.53]现在祝福我吧 就像你数年前住祝福我们那样
[02:24.70]当你给了我们一个奇迹
[02:28.29]
[02:30.79]奇迹现在降临在我身上 为时已晚了吗
